title: I cant be only one having this problem when i join a game, wont let me shop or use abilities!
body: Happens like 2/3 games where i join the game and wont let me use anything like lock camera, abilities, summoners spells, shop, activate items etc. but lets me write in chat with normaly, just lost 3 promos because of that and now i have another Leaverbuster penalty for 5 games! wtf

replies.body: That sounds like a strange issue!  Are you using any third party programs like play.tv or overlays that could be getting in the way of your match?  If so disable them for  the fix.  I also suggest disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) just in case, as it's been known to cause issues after an update auto-enabled it.  Let me know if that helps!
